srm_base_field_policy

Base class for access policy on a field per address map.

A policy represents the update to be done to the field model when a read or write issued to the design.  For example a field can be read_write in ‘cpu_map’ but read_only for ‘gpu_map’.  ReadWrite policy would imply that the write to the design or read from the design from the cpu_map would update the field model.  A ReadOnly policy would imply that only reads from the design in gpu_map would update the field model.  Writes to the design field would be ignored by the model.

Summary
srm_base_field_policy
Base class for access policy on a field per address map.
Class Declaration
virtual class srm_base_field_policy
Methods
read_policyModel the affect of doing a read from the field in the design.
write_policyModel the affect of doing a write to the field in the design.
get_nameName of the policy

Methods

read_policy

pure virtual function bit read_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Model the affect of doing a read from the field in the design.

Returns 0: Skip update to the field model.  1: Update the field model.

write_policy

pure virtual function bit write_policy( srm_base_field  field,
ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Model the affect of doing a write to the field in the design.

Returns 0: Skip update to the field model.  1: Update the field model with data.

get_name

pure virtual function string get_name()

Name of the policy
